name: Luqman Herifa: Personal Portfolio v2
desc: Luqman Herifa is a personal portfolio v2 contains information about me, works, and social media contacts based on web. The project was developed for personal portfolio using React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, HTML/CSS, and others.

name: Motocraft: Motorcycle Workshop App
desc: Motocraft is a motorcycle workshop management information system contains promo, info, services, spare part, employee, attendance, and revenue features based on web. The project was developed for motorcycle workshop MIS using React, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and others.

name: Wordium: Writing Platform
desc: Wordium is a writing platform contains story, knowledge, and perspective, post submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing Laravel and CRUD using Blade, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and others.

name: Proteus: Post Hub
desc: Proteus is a post hub contains posts and users information and detail, post and user submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing React and fetch API using React, Axios, TailwindCSS, and others.

name: NoTimeToNews: News Portal
desc: NoTimeToNews is a news portal contains highlight and daily news, news submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing React and CRUD using React, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and others.

name: Under Construction
desc: This website is currently under construction. Please bear with us while we work on improving it to provide you with the best possible experience. Thank you for your understanding.
